SELECT D.DEVICE_NUM , D.OLD_DEVICE_ID , DEVICE_TYPE AS DEVICE_TYPE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = '6' AND C.CODE = D.DEVICE_TYPE) AS DEVICE_TYPE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = '5' AND C.CODE = D.STATUS_CODE) AS STATUS , U.USER_NAME , O.ORG_NAME , D.MODEL_NAME , D.MANUFACTURE_DATE FROM DEVICE D LEFT JOIN USER U ON D.EMP_NUM = U.EMP_NUM LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION O ON U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID
AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND O.ORG_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY D.CREATE_DATETIME DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEVICE D LEFT JOIN USER U ON D.EMP_NUM = U.EMP_NUM
AND U.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

SELECT D.DEVICE_NUM , D.OLD_DEVICE_ID , D.USAGE_DIVISION , D.USAGE_PURPOSE , D.ARCHIVE_LOCATION , D.DEVICE_TYPE AS DEVICE_TYPE_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = '6' AND C.CODE = D.DEVICE_TYPE) AS DEVICE_TYPE , D.MODEL_NAME , D.MANUFACTURE_DATE , D.CPU_SPEC , D.MEMORY_SIZE , D.STORAGE_INFO , D.OPERATING_SYSTEM , D.SCREEN_SIZE , D.GPU_SPEC , D.STATUS_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE C WHERE C.CATEGORY = '5' AND C.CODE = D.STATUS_CODE) AS STATUS , D.PURCHASE_DATE , D.RETURN_DATE , D.REMARKS , D.EMP_NUM , U.USER_NAME , O.ORG_NAME , D.MODEL_NAME , D.MANUFACTURE_DATE FROM DEVICE D LEFT JOIN USER U ON D.EMP_NUM = U.EMP_NUM LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION O ON U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID WHERE DEVICE_NUM = #{deviceNum}
